title: [GER/ENG] Public Teamspeak-Server [cutegayvillage.de]
body:
Hey, I'm hosting a Teamspeak-Server for some friends and myself but I wouldn't mind having more people on there. Basically I'm offering you a Teamspeak-Server, where you can try to find team-mates to play with. 
The name: I'm the only gay person on there, we only accept tolerant people on our Server. :3
